name: UFO Rider
description:
In the form of an action game of the "endless" type where you must show your skill to abduct humans and fight earth military forces.

In Ufo Rider, the difficulty will increase as you move through each of the four scenarios in endless rounds. It will be in this infinite warlike conflict where you must
show humans why you believe that the planet belongs to you by right!.

How to play:

1 - Use the virtual gamepad on the left to move the ship.
2 - Use the (half) virtual gamepad on the right to shoot.
3 - Each time you get closer to the bottom of the screen an abduct ray will appear automatically.
4 - Capture as many humans as you can and destroy everything that shoots you.

Game Features:

1 - Endless (rotating) between 4 magnificent stages
2 - Progressive difficulty throughout the stages and the rounds.
3 - Optimized for touchscreens.
4 - Optimized for different resolutions
5 - High quality animated graphics
6 - Different characters to abduct with different characteristics.
